data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes on some Brazilian species of Synalpheus Spence Bate, 1888, with new records and description of a new species (Decapoda, Alpheidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur, Pachelle, Paulo P. G. (2014): Taxonomic notes on some Brazilian species of Synalpheus Spence Bate, 1888, with new records and description of a new species (Decapoda, Alpheidae). Zootaxa 3815 (2): 215-232, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3815.2.3
